statements: DELETE FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_id = 123 AND author_id = 456

DELETE FROM content_revisions WHERE revision_number > 5 AND created_at < '2022-09-01';

DELETE FROM revision_versions WHERE version_number > 10 AND version_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM revision_metadata WHERE editor_id = 100 AND notes IS NULL;
DELETE FROM version_control WHERE version_number < 10 AND created_at < '2022-01-01';
